column1: #text=I was getting ready to go out and needed to get cleaned before I went so I decided to take a bath .
#text=I filled the bathtub with warm water and added some bubble bath .
#text=I got undressed and stepped into the water .
#text=I grabbed the soap and rubbed it on my body and rinsed the soap off in the water .
#text=Then I laid down in the bathtub to get my hair wet the put some shampoo on my hair .
#text=It was a fruity smelling shampoo and smelled really nice .
#text=Then I rubbed my hair to get the shampoo through it .
#text=Then I laid back down in the tub to rinse the shampoo out of my hair .
#text=Then I laid in the water for about ten minutes meditating .
#text=Then I got out of the tub and grabbed a towel and dried off .
